item.description:
Regardless of your business, you need to know what works today.

Is your marketing plan up to date?
Are you using all that's available?
Are you reaching who you want to reach?

In this 2 hour workshop, I will cover:

- Top 10 Marketing tips to bring your business to the next level.
- 7 Marketing Myths that could be killing your business.
- Referral marketing and how to use it to propel your business to the next level.
- and, much more...
****************************************
WILL WHAT I TEACH HELP YOU TO MAKE MONEY?
****************************************
What I am teaching, if applied, will help you to earn whatever income you are looking to create. It's helped me to go from being a struggling single mom, not receiving child support, to being a happy, worry free entrepreneur who provides choices to my children.

*******************************************
WHO AM I AND WHY SHOULD YOU LISTEN TO ME?
*******************************************
Great question. My name is Bernadette Trafton. First and foremost, I am the proud mother of 2 wonderful children. I live in Derry, NH. I am the Founder of the Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association. I am also a Vice Presidential Marketing Director for FDI Youngevity.

Using what I am going to share with you, I began my real estate group over 4 years ago. My goal was to have more than 100 members and have more than $10,000 in the bank before the first meeting ever happened. Guess what, I had 128 members and $12,000 in the bank.

With FDI Youngevity, I used the same techinques to become a VPMD, earning a significant monthly residual income as well as leading hundreds of people to do the same.

My mission is to help as many people create additional streams of income, whether through real estate or networking, so they will always have income regardless of the economy or the market or what the banks or government are deciding.

***********************************************
WHERE, WHEN, WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING?
***********************************************

Where: FDIY Corporate, 1 Industrial Dr., Windham, NH
When: Wed, May 2, 2012, 7pm - 9pm
Bring: Pen, notebook, $5 to help with the cost of supplies and coffee, a willingness to learn

Simple enough? There are no parking fees to worry about, we have a big parking lot. Be sure to jot down my cell, if you get lost or need it or just have questions. Bernadette - 603-834-4587.

group.name: Your Bridge to health and wealth
